Html:
TypeScript colours numbers the same as strings - is that intentional?

 

// TypeScript

var ilikepie = 3.14159265359;

var stringpie = "3.14159265359";

 

// C#

var ilikepie = 3.14159265359;

var stringpie = "3.14159265359";

 

Certainly not trying to suggest that TypeScript should try to emulate C# - but surely they can still be friends when it comes to sharing colours in the IDE?!

Thanks
